overview: Autumn Whispers...Winter Dreams is a soothing visual journey through one of nature's most spectacular settings...the Colorado Rockies as Autumn gently surrenders to the beckoning call of Winter! Experience the breathtaking beauty...of yellow, gold and red Aspen leaves tingling in the frosty wind...cascading mountain waterfalls and rushing crystalline streams...towering evergreens swaying against snowy mountain peaks...and crystal blue mountain streams etching their way through Winter's gentle blanket of white!
title: Moodtapes: Autumn Whispers, Winter Dreams
